ygData.subject: RE: I can't Screech
ygData.msgSnippet: When I did mine, I was too antsy to actually stay afk for very long. So, I would pop back about every 20 minutes and check things.  Here is something I think I
ygData.messageBody:
When I did mine, I was too antsy to actually stay afk for very long. So, I
would pop back about every 20 minutes and check things. Here is something I
think I saw. I would get 2 and 3 skill check or advance messages right
after starting the song. Then non for very long time. But a quick 2 may be
3 each time I stopped and restarted the song.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: kbachman [mailto:kbachman@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 3:16 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] I can't Screech

From: kbachman <kbachman@...>

4. If you play DDD with a brass instrument for oh, say, 30
minutes (5 should do it)
and get no skill increases, you should /petition. You have
a problem.
